short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide static elements in theatre mode in Twitch when there are no interaction. Occasionally flip the chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For OLED screen users, automatically hide static elements and flip chat when watching Twitch Theatre mode.

P/S: If you encounter a bug, it might be because twitch change something in the UI, please don't rate badly and just notice me r/lynxerious on reddit.

Changelog:
- Fix some bug
- Hide leaderboard
- Allow hide highlight settings
